PHRASE.LANG: ガスマスク兵士のズボン
Not the most comfortable pair of pants, but they are made to assist in maintaining life, not making it more bearable. [#Legal]
Ce pantalon, certes pas des plus confortables, a été conçu dans le but de vous sauver la vie, pas de la rendre plus supportable. [#Legal]
Nicht die bequemste Hose. Soll aber auch Leben retten und keinen Preis für Tragekomfort gewinnen. [#Legal]
Non saranno comodissimi, ma dopotutto, devono aiutarti a sopravvivere… e lo fanno alla grande. [#Legal]
Tal vez no sean los pantalones más cómodos del mundo, pero se han diseñado para preservar la vida, no para hacerla más llevadera. [#Legal]
세상에서 가장 편안한 바지는 아니지만, 목숨이 붙어 있도록 도와주는 데에는 큰 도움이 된다. [#Legal]
Not the most comfortable pair of pants, but they are made to assist in maintaining life, not making it more bearable. [#Legal]
不怎麼舒適的褲子。誰叫這是為了協助維持生命，而非使它更愜意。 [#Legal]
不怎麼舒適的褲子。誰叫這是為了協助維持生命，而非使它更愜意。[#Legal]
Not the most comfortable pair of pants, but they are made to assist in maintaining life, not making it more bearable. [#Legal]
